# gitignore

Minimal `.gitignore` templates

## Miscellaneous

```gitignore
# Misc
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
logs
*.log
```

## Node.js

```gitignore
# Node.js
/node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
```

## Next.js

```gitignore
# Next.js
## Toolchain
/.next/

## Auto-generated sitemaps
/public/sitemap.xml
/public/sitemap-*.xml
/public/robots.tx
```
